Question
========

On which scale of measurement are years measured on? 

Answerlist
----------

* nominal
* ratio
* ordinal
* interval

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* nominal: Incorrect
* ratio: Incorrect
* ordinal: Incorrect
* interval: Correct
